document.full_text: families of the many victims of the september 11, 2001 attacks from massachusetts say they found relief, but not closure, in learning of the death of osama bin laden, the al qaeda leader who masterminded the attacks on the u.s.
document.title: boston remembers its 9/11 victims after bin laden death
lines_and_colors: families of the many victims of the september 11, 2001 attacks from massachusetts say they found relief, but not closure, in learning of the death of osama bin laden, the al qaeda leader who masterminded the attacks on the u.s.
